articles.title: Atlanta Braves, Michael Harris II agree to 8-year, $72 million extension
articles.description: The 8-year, $72M deal for Braves OF Michael Harris II runs through the 2030 season and includes team options for 2031 ($15 million) and 2032 ($20M).
articles.content:
The Atlanta Braves made another move Tuesday night to lock up their young core long term, agreeing to a eight-year, $72 million extension with outfielder Michael Harris II.

articles.title: Patrick Reed files defamation lawsuit against Golf Channel, commentator Brandel Chamblee
articles.description: In the lawsuit, Patrick Reed claims Brandel Chamblee and Golf Channel conspired with the PGA Tour and commissioner Jay Monahan to defame him "since he was 23 years old" -- nine years ago.

articles.title: Serena Williams' run in Cincinnati short-lived, as Emma Raducanu posts Round 1 win in straight sets
articles.description: In what proved to be her final tune-up match before the U.S. Open, Serena Williams lost in straight sets on Tuesday night to Emma Raducanu in the first round of the Western & Southern Open in Ohio.

articles.title: New England Patriots put Malcolm Butler on injured reserve
articles.description: The Pats placed Malcolm Butler on injured reserve Tuesday, ending his season as he attempted a comeback with the franchise where he became a Super Bowl hero seven years ago. Butler sustained a hip injury, a source said.
